name: Highway Police Car Driving
description:
Highway Police Car Drivingis an Car Driving Open World Simulation Game. Drift your police car around the open world, performing stunts, jumping off ramps, roofs, and buildings. Crashing into other vehicles and causing damage to them.
GAME FEATURES

- Dynamic camera angles, witness your amazing stunts from multiple views!
- The best car driving physics
- TWO huge open world city environments, stunt city and drift city,more to come soon!
- Interact with real world objects and surfaces, crash through billboards!
- Realistic vehicle damage, every hit and scrape shown with each collision
- Authentic police car lights and sounds
